WorkItem.Description:
The Nuget package for MVVM Light on the Windows 8 Consumer preview adds an incorrect XMLNS reference to the ViewModel name space for the Locator.

It currently adds the reference thus:
xmlns:vm="clr-namespace:<namespace>.ViewModel"

Correct notation for windows 8 project references should be as follows:
xmlns:vm="using:<namespace>.ViewModel"

Just a minor correction and one easily made by hand but would be good if the Nuget Package was updated to reflect this.
WorkItem.Summary: XMLNS reference added to projects through Nuget package for Win8CP

Comments.Message: Ah yes it is a good point. Damn, I think that will force me to create a separate package for Windows 8... I will fix it.
